includedAssets.title: The Purple Piano Project
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep1 - The Purple Piano Project
includedAssets.synopsis: Season three of the must-see TV phenomenon. The gang are back, but a few things have changed around McKinley High...
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Season three of the must-see TV phenomenon. The gang are back, but a few things have changed around McKinley High...
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Season three of the must-see TV phenomenon. The gang are back, but a few things have changed around McKinley High...

includedAssets.title: I Am Unicorn
includedAssets.synopsis: A few feathers are ruffled at McKinley High when Rachel's mum Shelby (Broadway star Idina Menzel) returns. Plus, Brittany helps Kurt run for class president.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A few feathers are ruffled at McKinley High when Rachel's mum Shelby (Idina Menzel) returns. Plus, Brittany helps Kurt run for class president.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A few feathers are ruffled at McKinley High when Rachel's mum Shelby (Broadway star Idina Menzel) returns. Plus, Brittany helps Kurt run for class president.

includedAssets.title: Asian F
includedAssets.synopsis: Mike Chang comes under pressure from his parents to quit the New Directions, while Rachel and Mercedes go head-to-head for the lead role in West Side Story.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Mike comes under pressure from his parents to quit the New Directions, while Rachel and Mercedes go head-to-head for the lead role in West Side Story.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Mike Chang comes under pressure from his parents to quit the New Directions, while Rachel and Mercedes go head-to-head for the lead role in West Side Story.

includedAssets.title: Pot O' Gold
includedAssets.synopsis: Brittany is thrilled when exchange student Rory (The Glee Project winner Damian McGinty) moves in with her family. But his arrival isn't as pleasing for some...
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Brittany is thrilled when exchange student Rory (The Glee Project winner Damian McGinty) moves in with her family.

includedAssets.title: The First Time
includedAssets.synopsis: As the kids prepare for the opening night of West Side Story, two New Directions members contemplate taking the next step with their significant others.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As the kids prepare for the opening of West Side Story, two New Directions members contemplate taking the next step with their significant others.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As the kids prepare for the opening night of West Side Story, two New Directions members contemplate taking the next step with their significant others.

includedAssets.title: Mash Off
includedAssets.synopsis: When Will and Shelby encourage some friendly competition between New Directions and rival group The Troubletones, an epic battle ensues. Plus, Puck has a crush.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When Will and Shelby encourage some friendly competition between New Directions and rival group The Troubletones, an epic battle ensues.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When Will and Shelby encourage some friendly competition between New Directions and rival group The Troubletones, an epic battle ensues. Plus, Puck has a crush.

includedAssets.title: I Kissed A Girl
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep7 - I Kissed A Girl
includedAssets.synopsis: Scandal overshadows the result of the student elections, while Finn tries to rally the New Directions and Trouble Tones behind one of their own.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Scandal overshadows the result of the student elections, while Finn tries to rally the New Directions and Trouble Tones behind one of their own.

includedAssets.title: Hold On To Sixteen
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep8 - Hold On To Sixteen
includedAssets.synopsis: At Sectionals, New Directions compete against the Trouble Tones, while a familiar face returns to McKinley and gives a boost to one of the show choirs.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: At Sectionals, New Directions compete against the Trouble Tones, while a familiar face returns to McKinley and gives a boost to one of the choirs.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: At Sectionals, New Directions compete against the Trouble Tones, while a familiar face returns to McKinley and gives a boost to one of the show choirs.

includedAssets.title: Extraordinary Merry Christmas
includedAssets.synopsis: New Directions face a tough decision when they're asked to perform at two events at the same time. Matthew Morrison (Mr Schue) directs.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: New Directions face a tough decision when they're asked to perform at two events at the same time. Matthew Morrison (Mr Schue) directs.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: New Directions face a tough decision when they're asked to perform at two events at the same time. Matthew Morrison (Mr Schue) directs.

includedAssets.title: Yes/No
includedAssets.synopsis: While Will is inspired to take the next step in his relationship with Emma, Finn makes a dramatic decision. Helen Mirren guest stars.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Will is inspired to take the next step in his relationship with Emma, Finn makes a dramatic decision. Helen Mirren guest stars.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Will is inspired to take the next step in his relationship with Emma, Finn makes a dramatic decision. Helen Mirren guest stars.

includedAssets.title: Michael
includedAssets.synopsis: The New Directions battle the Dalton Warblers for the privilege of performing the music of the late King of Pop, Michael Jackson, at Regionals.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The New Directions battle the Dalton Warblers for the privilege of performing the music of the late King of Pop, Michael Jackson, at Regionals.

includedAssets.title: The Spanish Teacher
includedAssets.synopsis: Will encounters the inspiring David Martinez (guest star Ricky 'Livin' La Vida Loca' Martin) when he attempts to improve his Spanish at night school.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Will encounters the inspiring David Martinez (guest star Ricky 'Livin' La Vida Loca' Martin) when he attempts to improve his Spanish at night school.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Will encounters the inspiring David Martinez (guest star Ricky 'Livin' La Vida Loca' Martin) when he attempts to improve his Spanish at night school.

includedAssets.title: Heart
includedAssets.synopsis: While the kids mark Valentine's Day, Rachel's dads throw her and Finn a celebratory dinner. Jeff Goldblum & Brian Stokes Mitchell guest star as Hiram & LeRoy Berry.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While the kids mark Valentine's Day, Rachel's dads throw her and Finn a celebratory dinner. Jeff Goldblum & Brian Stokes Mitchell guest star.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While the kids mark Valentine's Day, Rachel's dads throw her and Finn a celebratory dinner. Jeff Goldblum & Brian Stokes Mitchell guest star as Hiram & LeRoy Berry.

includedAssets.title: On My Way
includedAssets.synopsis: While the New Directions prepare to do battle with the Warblers at Regionals, a devastating event shocks the group. Plus, Rachel and Finn make a sudden decision.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While the New Directions prepare to do battle at Regionals, a devastating event shocks the group. Plus, Rachel and Finn make a sudden decision.

includedAssets.title: Big Brother
includedAssets.synopsis: While the seniors plan fun for skip day, Blaine is none too pleased to see his big-shot Hollywood actor brother, Cooper. Matt Bomer (White Collar) guest stars.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While the seniors plan fun for skip day, Blaine is none too pleased to see his big-shot Hollywood actor brother, Cooper. Matt Bomer guest stars.

includedAssets.title: Saturday Night Glee-Ver
includedAssets.synopsis: A disco inferno rages at McKinley when the New Directions pay homage to the iconic 70s movie Saturday Night Fever. Plus, Sue faces a battle.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A disco inferno rages at McKinley when the New Directions pay homage to the iconic 70s movie Saturday Night Fever. Plus, Sue faces a battle.

includedAssets.title: Dance With Somebody
includedAssets.synopsis: The New Directions pay homage to a musical icon when they cover Whitney Houston's greatest hits. Emma and Will plan their dream wedding.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The New Directions pay homage to a musical icon when they cover Whitney Houston's greatest hits. Emma and Will plan their dream wedding.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The New Directions pay homage to a musical icon when they cover Whitney Houston's greatest hits. Emma and Will plan their dream wedding.

includedAssets.title: Choke
includedAssets.synopsis: It's the moment of truth for Rachel and Kurt when a NYADA professor travels to Ohio to see them audition. Puck makes plans too. Whoopi Goldberg guest stars.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: It's the moment of truth for Rachel and Kurt when a NYADA professor travels to Ohio to see them audition. Whoopi Goldberg guest stars.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: It's the moment of truth for Rachel and Kurt when a NYADA professor travels to Ohio to see them audition. Puck makes plans too. Whoopi Goldberg guest stars.

includedAssets.title: Prom-A-Saurus
includedAssets.synopsis: Brittany steps up to her Class President status and organises the Senior Prom complete with dinosaur theme. Quinn launches an assault to be Prom Queen too.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Brittany steps up to her Class President status and organises the Senior Prom complete with dinosaur theme. Quinn campaigns to be Prom Queen.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Brittany steps up to her Class President status and organises the Senior Prom complete with dinosaur theme. Quinn launches an assault to be Prom Queen too.

includedAssets.title: Props
includedAssets.synopsis: With Nationals looming, the kids prepare a high-concept routine. But when Tina bumps her head in rehearsals, her New Directions world is turned upside down.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The kids prepare a high-concept routine for Nationals, but when Tina bumps her head in rehearsals, her New Directions world is turned upside down.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: With Nationals looming, the kids prepare a high-concept routine. But when Tina bumps her head in rehearsals, her New Directions world is turned upside down.

includedAssets.title: Nationals
includedAssets.synopsis: As the day of Nationals dawns, New Directions hope to sing and dance their way to victory by impressing the judging panel, including Lindsay Lohan.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As the day of Nationals dawns, New Directions hope to sing and dance their way to victory by impressing the judging panel, including Lindsay Lohan.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As the day of Nationals dawns, New Directions hope to sing and dance their way to victory by impressing the judging panel, including Lindsay Lohan.

includedAssets.title: Goodbye
includedAssets.synopsis: Graduation arrives for the class of 2012 as Rachel, Finn, Santana, Kurt, Puck, Quinn, Mercedes and Mike bid farewell to the New Directions. Last in series.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Graduation arrives for the class of 2012 as Rachel, Finn, Santana, Kurt, Puck, Quinn, Mercedes and Mike bid farewell to the New Directions.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Graduation arrives for the class of 2012 as Rachel, Finn, Santana, Kurt, Puck, Quinn, Mercedes and Mike bid farewell to the New Directions. Last in series.

includedAssets.title: Season 3
includedAssets.synopsis: Lindsay Lohan, Whoopi Goldberg and Perez Hilton guest star in the third chapter of the hit series, which sees the seniors preparing for graduation. As some of its members get ready to move on, the glee club attend prom, plus pay tribute to the late Whitney Houston and Michael Jackson.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Lindsay Lohan, Whoopi Goldberg and Perez Hilton guest star in the third chapter of the hit series, which sees the seniors preparing for graduation. As some of its members get ready to move on, the glee club attend prom, plus pay tribute to the late Whitney Houston and Michael Jackson.

includedIn.title: Glee
includedIn.synopsis: The William McKinley High School glee club, New Directions, attempt to compete on the highly competitive show choir circuit, while dealing with social issues and learning to work as a team.
